search.query: index=logiq host=$hosttok|s$ (sourcetype=dgwip OR sourcetype=dglog) connectionID=* | rex field=log "^http: proxy (?P<action>.*)\s\[(?P<process>[^\/]+)\/(?P<PID>\d+)].*(?P<method>(GET|PUT|POST|DELETE|PATCH|OPTIONS))\s+(?P<protocol>\w+)\s+\S+\s+(?P<url>[^ ]+)\s+\d+\s+(?P<status>\d+)" | stats count BY process

index=logiq host=$hosttok|s$ (sourcetype=dgwip OR sourcetype=dglog) connectionID=* | rex field=log "^http: proxy (?P<action>.*)\s\[(?P<process>[^\/]+)\/(?P<PID>\d+)].*(?P<method>(GET|PUT|POST|DELETE|PATCH|OPTIONS))\s+(?P<protocol>\w+)\s+\S+\s+(?P<url>[^ ]+)\s+\d+\s+(?P<status>\d+)" | stats count BY action

index=logiq host=$hosttok|s$ (sourcetype=dgwip OR sourcetype=dglog) connectionID=* | rex field=log ": proxy (?P<action>.*)\s\[(?P<process>[^\/]+)\/(?P<PID>\d+)].*(?P<method>(GET|PUT|POST|DELETE|PATCH|OPTIONS))\s+(?P<protocol>\w+)\s+\S+\s+(?P<url>[^ ]+)\s+\d+\s+(?P<status>\d+)" | search action=$actiontok|s$ process=$proctok|s$ | stats count BY url

index=logiq host=$hosttok|s$ (sourcetype=dgwip OR sourcetype=dglog) connectionID=* | rex field=log ": proxy (?P<action>.*)\s\[(?P<process>[^\/]+)\/(?P<PID>\d+)].*(?P<method>(GET|PUT|POST|DELETE|PATCH|OPTIONS))\s+(?P<protocol>\w+)\s+\S+\s+(?P<url>[^ ]+)\s+\d+\s+(?P<status>\d+)" | search action=$actiontok|s$ process=$proctok|s$ | sort 0 -_time | eval Time = strftime(_time, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S.%3N") | dedup Time action PID url status | table Time, action, process, PID, url, protocol, method, status

index=logiq host=$hosttok|s$ sourcetype=config_xml NOT !|rex field=_raw "^(?P<Config_Tag>[^\t >]+)[\t ]*(?P<Config_Attrib>[^>]*)>(?P<Config_Value>[^<]*)"|reverse|search Config_Tag=*wip* Config_Value=* |table Config_Tag, Config_Value, Config_Attrib

index=logiq host=$hosttok|s$ (sourcetype=dgwip OR sourcetype=dglog) connectionID=* | regex requestID="\d+" | sort 0 -_time | stats list(log) AS log list(_time) as _time by connectionID requestID | sort 0 -connectionID, -requestID | eval Time = strftime(_time, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S.%3N") | rename connectionID AS Connection, requestID AS Request, log AS Log | table Connection, Request, Time, Log

index=logiq host=$hosttok|s$ (sourcetype=dgwip OR sourcetype=dglog) connectionID=* requestID=* | sort 0 -_time | stats list(requestID) AS requestID list(log) AS log list(_time) AS _time by connectionID | sort 0 -connectionID | eval Time = strftime(_time, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S.%3N") | rename connectionID AS Connection, requestID AS Request, log AS Log | table Connection, Request, Time, Log
